item.title: pugliese web
item.description: Apache server

item.title: Emanuele Pugliese - Java Engineer
item.description: Graduate as an Electronic Engineer, Emanuele is a strong understanding of Object Oriented concepts as well as Design Patterns and best practice. His IT interests range across different technologies and frameworks such as Spring and ORM, GWT and Android Development, architectural design such as RESTful systems and Open Source software.
